document_data.name: Cate Quirkilious
document_data.mainbody:
'''Cate Quirkilious''' was a daughter of [[Thomas C. Quirkilious]], the [[dragonborn]] proprietor of the [[Chromatic Scale]] music shop in the [[Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''I'm terribly homesick, and for that, I know only one cure.''|Cate Quirkilious}}
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Cate departed Baldur's Gate for [[Calimshan]]. The city of [[Calimport]] dazzled the woman and its music tickled her ears. There, she encountered a curious [[snakeskin]] musical instrument called [[slitherhorn]]. In her letter to Thomas, she promised to bring the instrument home and play it for him.
